content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 1.5) - not connected
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 2.5)
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 6.5)
- Connected with pipes forming a water and steam network
- Boiler is currently out of fuel
- System is experiencing connection issues between components
- When operational, produces water at a rate of approximately 640-1100 units per minute and converts it to steam

### Stone Mining Facility at position (-56.0, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Top row mining drills:
  - Electric mining drill at position (-64.5, 5.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-60.5, 5.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-56.5, 5.5)
- Bottom row mining drills:
  - Electric mining drill at position (-64.5, 9.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-60.5, 9.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-56.5, 9.5)
- Wooden chests at each drill's drop position to collect stone:
  - Chest at position (-64.5, 7.5) - contains 139 stone
  - Chest at position (-60.5, 7.5) - contains 527 stone
  - Chest at position (-56.5, 7.5) - contains 726 stone
  - Chest at position (-64.5, 11.5) - contains 725 stone
  - Chest at position (-60.5, 11.5) - contains 725 stone
  - Chest at position (-56.5, 11.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
- Small electric poles providing power to the drills
- Transport belt network connecting the drills (partially functional)
- Currently most drills are not operating due to power issues and full chests
- When operational, produces stone at a rate of approximately 150-250 units per minute

### Stone Smelting Area at position (-56.0, 32.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces:
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 26.0) - idle with no ingredients, contains coal fuel
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 29.0) - idle with no ingredients, contains coal fuel
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 32.0) - idle with no ingredients, contains coal fuel
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 35.0) - idle with no ingredients, contains coal fuel
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 38.0) - idle with no ingredients, contains coal fuel
- Output inserters:
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 26.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 29.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 32.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 35.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 38.5)
- Output belts:
  - Transport belt at position (-52.5, 38.5)
- Small electric poles providing power to the inserters
- Furnaces are fueled with coal but currently idle with no stone to process
- Currently not producing due to lack of ingredients and power issues

### Stone Wall Production at position (-54.5, 51.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (-54.5, 51.5) - set to produce stone walls
- Input system:
  - Wooden chest at position (-57.5, 51.5) - currently empty
  - Inserter at position (-56.5, 51.5) moving stone bricks from chest to assembling machine
- Output system:
  - Inserter at position (-52.5, 51.5) moving stone walls from assembling machine
  - Wooden chest at position (-51.5, 51.5) - currently empty
- Currently not producing due to lack of stone bricks and power issues

## ERROR
